body: This serpentine, aquatic eidolon looks like a sea serpent or aquatic worm.
name: Sea Serpent
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Eidolon Models/Sea Serpent

sections.body: , 24 points (Huge): Base Form serpentine; Primary Evolutions gills, resist (fire), swim; Secondary Evolutions constrict, grab (bite and tail slap), immunity (cold), large, swallow whole.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Eidolon Models/Sea Serpent/18 points
sections.name: 18 points
